biotools.summary: Light-weight, cross-platform, C++ desktop application designed for visualizing biological networks such as metabolic pathways.It is a viewer, not an editor: this means a simpler interface, offering multiple perspectives on the same data, with a focus on navigation. It translates text-based descriptions of biological networks into standardized diagrams. Users can view the same model from different perspectives and easily alter the layout to emulate traditional textbook representations.
